name: dehumidificationMode_setValue
description: This function is used to set the mode of a SmartThings dehumidifier device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to set the dehumidification mode.

parameters.name: predefinedDehumidificationMode
parameters.description: The predefined dehumidification mode to set.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The mode to set for the dehumidification mode.
